title: AI-Powered运营与战略决策系统
description: 基于企业真实数据构建的AI决策系统，整合运营数据、市场情报与财务指标，提供实时洞察与预测分析，支持管理层快速制定战略决策。
description_en: An AI decision system built on real enterprise data, integrating operational data, market intelligence, and financial metrics to provide real-time insights and predictive analysis, supporting management in making rapid strategic decisions.
features: 实时数据监控与可视化仪表板
市场趋势预测与竞品分析
财务指标预测与风险评估
战略建议生成与方案评估
features_en: Real-time data monitoring and visualization dashboard
Market trend forecasting and competitor analysis
Financial metric forecasting and risk assessment
Strategic recommendation generation and plan evaluation

title: 全球采购与供应链优化平台
title_en: Global Sourcing & Supply Chain Optimization Platform
description: 为跨国企业打造的全球采购与供应链优化平台，整合供应商数据、物流信息与成本分析，实现采购决策自动化与供应链可视化。
description_en: A global sourcing and supply chain optimization platform built for multinational enterprises, integrating supplier data, logistics information, and cost analysis to automate procurement decisions and visualize supply chains.
features: 全球供应商数据库与评估系统
采购成本分析与优化建议
供应链风险评估与预警机制
物流路线优化与成本计算
features_en: Global supplier database and evaluation system
Procurement cost analysis and optimization recommendations
Supply chain risk assessment and early warning mechanism
Logistics route optimization and cost calculation

title: 企业内网与知识管理系统
description: 为跨国企业构建的一站式内网平台，集成公司公告、企业文化宣传、信息集中与知识管理等功能，提升员工工作效率与企业协作能力。
description_en: A one-stop intranet platform built for multinational enterprises, integrating company announcements, corporate culture promotion, information centralization, and knowledge management to enhance employee productivity and corporate collaboration.
features: 公司公告与新闻中心
企业文化宣传与员工活动
知识管理与文档共享
员工目录与团队协作
features_en: Company announcements and news center
Corporate culture promotion and employee activities
Knowledge management and document sharing
Employee directory and team collaboration

title: 投资组合优化与风险管理系统
description: 基于量化金融模型的投资组合优化与风险管理系统，利用机器学习算法预测市场趋势，实现投资组合的智能配置与风险控制。
description_en: A portfolio optimization and risk management system based on quantitative financial models, using machine learning algorithms to predict market trends and achieve intelligent portfolio allocation and risk control.
features: 投资组合优化算法
市场风险评估与预测
投资绩效分析与报告
资产配置建议与回测
features_en: Portfolio optimization algorithms
Market risk assessment and forecasting
Investment performance analysis and reporting
Asset allocation recommendations and backtesting

title: 澳大生存指南 - 校园社区平台
title_en: UM Survival Guide - Campus Community Platform
description: 为澳门大学学生打造的校园社区平台，提供校园生活指南、活动信息、学习资源与社交功能，成为澳大学生的必备工具。
description_en: A campus community platform built for University of Macau students, providing campus life guides, event information, learning resources, and social features, becoming an essential tool for UM students.
features: 校园生活指南与实用信息
活动日历与报名系统
学习资源共享与交流
学生社群与社交功能
features_en: Campus life guides and practical information
Event calendar and registration system
Learning resource sharing and exchange
Student communities and social features
